joins.text: Yeah, things have not been going well for me either.

dialog.text: I have spent the last couple of days trying to get my head around HTML and create a webpage.  Spent hours trying to center my image!  Eventually had to get Tom to help me.  Are you working anywhere at the moment - for money I mean?

I used to work five days a week but have reduced my shift to just weekends.  Now I am finishing uni work on Friday and then spend all weekend delivering parcels.  Its boring work, but I like the solo time.  I hope I can keep it going as I really need the cash.  Got to run, catch you later.
